data.title: Recovery from Cults By Michael D. Langone
data.meta_description: Buy Recovery from Cults: Help for Victims of Psychological and Spiritual Abuse By Michael D. Langone. Available in used condition with free US shipping on orders over $10. ISBN: 9780393701647. ISBN-10: 0393701646
data.text:
Note

This is a used book - there is no escaping the fact it has been read by someone else and it will show signs of wear and previous use. Overall we expect it to be in good condition, but if you are not entirely satisfied please get in touch with us
